subsection.name: Description
subsection.p: The Metro Tools Antlib provides a collection of tasks dealing with component development. These include a task supporting the creation of component type metainfo, component deployment metadata, and a task dealing with the generation of a component catalog.

p.i: Example build file that uses the catalog task:

subsection.pre:
<project name="dpml-http" default="install" basedir="." xmlns:transit="antlib:net.dpml.transit" xmlns:x="dpml:tools" xmlns:c="dpml:composition">
<transit:import uri="local:template:dpml/tools/standard"/>
<target name="build" depends="standard.build">
<x:plugin uri="link:plugin:dpml/metro/dpml-metro-tools"/>
<c:catalog> <fileset dir="${basedir}"> <include name="**/target/classes/main/**/*.type"/> </fileset> </c:catalog>
</target>
</project>
